description.brief: Pure divine energy that bypasses many defenses and provides special effectiveness against corrupted enemies.
description.detailed: Holy damage represents the power of divine order and purification. Unlike elemental damage which affects the physical realm, holy damage directly impacts the spiritual essence of targets. It is particularly effective against chaotic and corrupted entities while providing healing and protective benefits to allies.
description.visual_effects: Brilliant white and golden light with soft chiming sounds, radiant beams, and purifying aura effects
description.lore_explanation: Holy damage channels the power of cosmic order and divine will. In MysticMyst, this represents the stabilizing forces that work to maintain mystical harmony and resist chaotic timeline corruption.

status_effects.description: Target takes increased holy damage and reduced chaos damage
Allies near holy damage sources gain damage reduction and regeneration

resistances.penetration_mechanics: Holy damage bypasses physical armor but can be resisted by spiritual defenses

interactions.conditions: When holy damage hits a chaos-affected target

interactions.result: Physical attacks become blessed, gaining holy properties
interactions.conditions: When blessed weapons deal physical damage

mystical_aspects.mist-walker_synergy: Stabilizes mystical abilities, reducing chaos and preventing mystical backlash
mystical_aspects.mystical_enhancement: Time-locked holy effects can create persistent consecrated areas

build_archetypes.focus: Tank build with holy damage and ally protection
Anti-chaos specialist with burst holy damage
